name: Primary
aboutCourse:
The course is a 12 month course starting in September 2020. During the course you will have taught session at the University of Wolverhampton and 2 extended school placements with Linden's alliance of schools - a range of schools that are outstanding and good.
You will have experience throughout the primary range including key stage 1 and key stage 2
You will also have experience in EYFS and secondary
Each trainee has a tutor to support you achieve the Teachers' Standards
Lindens Teaching School is in partnership with the University of Wolverhampton - Gorway Road Campus
interviewProcess: The interview process consists of you meeting a member of staff from the teaching school and a member of staff from the university. You will have the opportunity to discuss ypur experience and why you want to be a teacher. A series of questions will be asked
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
All placement schools are within the alliance of our teaching schools and will be within the West Midlands area
You will have primary experience and an attachment in key stage 1 and in key stage 2.
Experience and additional days will be spent in EYFS / nursery and secondary
personalQualities:
experience that is current in a primary school 
insight into Primary practice
